page.title: 15An afternoon at Kirkby C.E.
page.content: School starts in the afternoon at 1.10 at which time the afternoon register is taken. The same 2 people who were off in the morning were again absent. Our teacher told us to change into our P.E. kit because we were to go into the Hall to practice the sack race for sports day. After that we practiced the flat race, egg and spoon and then the sack race again but for these we went out on to the field. When we came back into the classroom we got changed and a story was read to us called "Help I am a Prisoner in the Toothpaste Factory." At 2.30 we had playtime which lasted for 15 minutes and I played tick with my friends. When we came in we did some work on plurals in our English lesson. At 3.30 it was time to go home and I went to catch the 697 bus.
